title: 2 Level 5BR/3BA Single Family in Millbrae(1023 Vista Grande, Millbrae)
posting_body: ft. 5BR/3BA, two level single family home in Millbrae.
Home is on Grande Vista near Corte Del Sol.
Home faces east and has a panoramic view of the bay and East Bay Hills both from the deck and yard.
Top floor has living room with cathedral ceiling and fireplace, deck, dining room, kitchen, master bedroom with bath, second bedroom and shared bath.
Street entry opens onto the living room and dining room.
Both living room and dining room have sliding glass doors providing access to the large deck which overlooks the terraced yard.
There is a full wall of windows from living room to dining room overlooking the deck.
Living room has a stone fireplace.
There is a partial wall with window separating living room from dining room.
Kitchen is separated from the dining room by a breakfast bar.
Kitchen includes stainless oven, microwave and has a gas range.
Master and second bedroom are at the far end of the home opposite the living room.
Garage is accessed from the top floor.
Lower floor has a large family room with brick fireplace.
It has sliding glass doors opening onto the upper yard.
There is a full counter wooden bar on the side of the family room opposite the fireplace.
Washer and dryer are around a corner behind the bar.
Three bedrooms are at the far end of the home.
One of the bedrooms has a door to the back yard.
About two thirds of the lower level of the yard is concrete paved and has a pool.
Tenant may use pool but is responsible for its upkeep.
There are fruit trees including grapefruit and lemon on the side of the yard opposite the pool.
Street side of the home has a two-car garage with space for two cars parked outside it.
It includes a Meyer lemon tree.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.
